attributes.action: Get gluten free food at restaurants, takeaways and fast food places.
attributes.additional_details: Many people have coeliac disease and miss out on restaurants and take aways that others take for granted. It's not fair.
attributes.background: I want all restaurants, takeaways and fast food places to try and accommodate allergens instead of just vegans and vegetarians.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual restaurants as private businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
